name: Burn:Cycle
summary: Sol Cutter's plan was to slip into Softech, do some quick electronic thievery and make a pile of cash. What could go wrong? Plenty. The job sours when a freak power surge leaves Cutter with the mother of all headaches. But that's not all. Somehow, a computer virus has installed itself in his head. In exactly two hours, the Burn:Cycle virus will turn Sol Cutter's brain into jelly - unless you can find a way to deactivate it. Think fast. Shoot faster.
